short_summary: Repairing, inspecting, and calibrating gas detectors for the Department of National Defence in New Brunswick.
description: This contract includes the providing of all labour, material, tools and equipment required to complete the inspection, calibration and repair of Methane, Chlorine, Sulphur Dioxide, Hydrogen Sulfide, Ammonia, Carbon Monoxide and Carbon Dioxide detectors at 5 CDSB Gagetown, Oromocto, New Brunswick. This Contract will be from Issuance of Contract to September 30, 2025 with two (2) one (1) year optional periods.
full_summary:
===============

### Title
W6898-250704: Gas Detectors Maintenance Services

### Solicitation Details
================{}

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4659650941-Doc4665677372
*   **Amendment Number:** 2
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-07-02
*   **Tender Closing Date/TimestartultVals**: 2024-08-01T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2024-07-22
*   **Tender Status:** Expiré

### Procurement Information
=====================

*   **Procurement Category:** SRV
*   **Procurement Method:** Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
*   **Selection Criteria:** Variations ou combinaisons des méthodes susmentionnées
*   **Trade Agreements:***   ALENA
    *   AMP-OMC
    *   ALECC
    *   ALEC
    *   ACO-Korea
    *   ALECU
    *   CPTPGP

### Contract Details
==================

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC) / Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Nouveau-Brunswick (New Brunswick)
*   **Expected Contract Start/End:** None
*   **Contract Duration:** Issuance of Contract to September 30, 2025 with two (2), one (1) year optional periods

### Tender Description
=====================

Public Services and Procurement Canada on behalf of the Department of National Defence, Real Property Operations Unit (Atlantic) requests a Service Contract for the inspection, calibration, and repair of methane, chlorine, sulphur dioxide, hydrogen sulphide, ammonia, carbon monoxide, and carbon dioxide detectors at 5 CDSB Gagetown, Oromocto, New Brunswick.

### Important Notes
==================

*   The solicitation has expired.
*   Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation.
*   Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
*   Reference the solicitation for further details.

### Contact Information
=====================

*   **Contact Name:** Blanchard, Ch
